languages.text: {n}Кассия недоуменно изгибает бровь.{/n} "Так ты... прислуга? Открой рот, хочу убедиться, что тебе хирургировали язык и поставили клеймо нашего дом..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия недоуменно изгибает бровь.{/n} "Так ты... Прислуга? Открой рот, хочу убедиться, что тебе хирургировали язык и поставили клеймо нашего дом...".

languages.text: {n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House se—"
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия недоуменно изгибает бровь.{/n} "Так ты... прислуга? Открой рот, хочу убедиться, что тебе хирургировали язык и поставили клеймо нашего дом..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House's se..."
{n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House's se..."

{n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House se—"

languages.text: {n}卡西娅困惑地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“所以你是……仆人吗？把嘴张开，我需要确认你的舌头经过了手术改造，确定你被烙上了我们家族的烙印——”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House se—"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅困惑地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“所以你是……仆人吗？把嘴张开，我需要确认你的舌头经过了手术改造，确定你被烙上了我们家族的烙印——”

languages.text: {n}Cassia levanta una ceja, confusa.{/n} «¿De modo que eres... un{mf||a} sirviente? Abre la boca para que me asegure de que tienes la lengua operada y marcada con el sello de la ca...».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House se—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia levanta una ceja, confusa.{/n} «¿De modo que eres... un{mf||a} sirviente? Abre la boca para que me asegure de que tienes la lengua operada y marcada con el sello de la ca...».

languages.text: {n}カシアは困惑して眉根を寄せた。{/n}「ではあなたは…使用人なのですか？口を開けてください。あなたの舌がチラージョンを受け、我が家の烙印が押されていることを確かめねば―」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House se—"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは困惑して眉根を寄せた。{/n}「ではあなたは…使用人なのですか？口を開けてください。あなたの舌がチラージョンを受け、我が家の烙印が押されていることを確かめねば―」

languages.text: {n}Cassia hebt verwirrt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Ihr seid also ... ein Diener? Öffnet den Mund, ich muss sichergehen, dass Eure Zunge entfernt wurde und Ihr mit dem Brandmal unseres Hau-"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House se—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia hebt verwirrt eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Ihr seid also ... ein Diener? Öffnet den Mund, ich muss sichergehen, dass Eure Zunge entfernt wurde und Ihr mit dem Brandmal unseres Hau-"

languages.text: {n}Perplexe, Cassia hausse un sourcil.{/n} « Êtes-vous... {mf|un serviteur|une servante} ? Ouvrez la bouche, je dois m'assurer que votre langue a été sectionnée et que vous portez bel et bien le sceau de la maison Orse... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House se—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Perplexe, Cassia hausse un sourcil.{/n} « Êtes-vous... {mf|un serviteur|une servante} ? Ouvrez la bouche, je dois m'assurer que votre langue a été sectionnée et que vous portez bel et bien le sceau de la maison Orse... »

languages.text: {n}Cassia, şaşkınlıkla tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Yani sen... Hizmetkâr mısın? Ağzını aç, dilinin cerrahlarca kesilip kesilmediğini ve hanemizin simgesiyle damgalanıp damgalanmadığını görmem..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia raises an eyebrow in confusion.{/n} "So you are... a servant? Open your mouth, I need to make sure your tongue was chirurgeoned and you were properly branded with our House se—"
